description: http: update mime sniffing doc reference.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

LGTM

On Wed, Nov 2, 2011 at 6:01 PM, <dsymonds@golang.org> wrote:

> Reviewers: golang-dev_googlegroups.com,
>
> Message:
> Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,
>
> I'd like you to review this change to
> https://go.googlecode.com/hg/
>
>
> Description:
> http: update mime sniffing doc reference.
>
> Please review this at http://codereview.appspot.com/**5303095/<http://codereview.appspot.com/5303095/>
>
> Affected files:
>  M src/pkg/http/sniff.go
>
>
> Index: src/pkg/http/sniff.go
> ==============================**==============================**=======
> --- a/src/pkg/http/sniff.go
> +++ b/src/pkg/http/sniff.go
> @@ -11,7 +11,7 @@
>
>  // Content-type sniffing algorithm.
>  // References in this file refer to this draft specification:
> -//   http://tools.ietf.org/html/**draft-ietf-websec-mime-sniff-**03<http://tools.ietf.org/html/draft-ietf-websec-mime-sniff-03>
> +//   http://mimesniff.spec.whatwg.**org/<http://mimesniff.spec.whatwg.org/>
>
>  // The algorithm prefers to use sniffLen bytes to make its decision.
>  const sniffLen = 512
>
>
>

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=4281e3046609 ***

http: update mime sniffing doc reference.

R=golang-dev, bradfitz
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5303095

subject: code review 5303095: http: update mime sniffing doc reference.
